main.name: Rashikraj Shrestha
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use React JS as frontend framework and Django/Flask as backend framework to build you a beautiful web sites.
main.bio: Hi, I’m Rashikraj Shrestha passionate to work as a web developer. I have 2 years of experience in working as backend developer. I can build beautiful website using django/flask framework. I believe in my dedication and passion. I am a Computer Engineer by profession.
main.contactmessage: Would you like to work with me? Awesome!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Participated in various competition. Learned about fundamentals of engineering. Graduated.
Studied Physical Science and Graduated with 78.8%.

work.title: Django Intern
work.description: Make Django web apps, but mostly work in Odoo framework to add feature to in-house Odoo website.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer
work.description: Design database, make fully functional webapps in Django and add new features to ERP in Odoo.

work.title: Python Developer
work.description: Design database system, create rest API and lead Backend.

work.title: Python Developer
work.description: Design database, create rest API for making Digital Wallet more secure and add new services.
